Name: Demon Cycle
About the game: Demon Cycle is a casual strategy game, where luck favors the prepared. You have limited turns to make enough coins to pass the floor. Your choices will determine the outcome. Features Tough choices with a dash of luck Upgradeable Demon Minions Over 50 unique cards Give the Demon Lords exactly what they asked for.... maliciously~ 5 Demon Lords to defeat and get Loot! Campaign/Endless Mode This is a game created by two people, and has been an exciting endeavor! And we thank you for supporting us!
